questions.question_text:
A project's business case was just approved and the project manager is creating the benefits management plan. It is unclear how the benefits from the project align with the organization's vision.

What should the project manager do first to verify alignment?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Meet with the project sponsor to obtain more information

Selected Answer: C
Le parrain du projet est généralement bien placé pour expliquer comment les objectifs et les avantages du projet s’intègrent dans la stratégie globale de l’organisation. Cette rencontre permet également de s'assurer que toutes les parties prenantes sont sur la même longueur d’onde et que le projet contribue de manière significative à la réalisation des buts stratégiques de l'organisation.

choices.C: Meet with the project sponsor to obtain more information.
choices.B: Ask the project team to delay the kick-off while resolving the concern.
choices.A: Consult with the project team members to gain their opinions.
choices.D: Request a copy of the project assumptions log for more insight.

questions.question_text:
A company is engaged in a transformation journey, and the project manager for this endeavor is new to this project. During one of the project status update meetings, a key stakeholder, the project manager's functional manager, is dissatisfied with the work in progress, and points to the project manager.

What should the project manager do?

choices.D: Listen carefully and show understanding of the growing needs of the functional manager.
choices.B: Admit that the functional manager is right and promise to rectify the situation immediately.
choices.C: Schedule a one-on-one meeting with the functional manager to prove the project is on time.
choices.A: Show the functional manager that the progress is on time based on the schedule.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Listen carefully and show understanding of the growing needs of the functional manager

choices.A: Ask the project sponsor to inform the client in the next update.
choices.B: Do not disclose the likelihood of a delay as it is yet to happen.
choices.D: Tell the client about the chance for the potential delay.
choices.C: Work with the project team to evaluate the potential delay.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Work with the project team to evaluate the potential delay

Selected Answer: C
Always evaluate with your team members before meeting with stakeholders.

questions.question_text: A project manager notices that the project team is unlikely to complete the development of a system on time before the testing start date, which was based on the technical complexity of the project. What should the project manager do before communicating with the client during the regular project progress meeting?

choices.A: Determine what the problem is and develop an action plan
choices.D: Record the meeting to share with the team members who were unable to join
choices.C: Procure tools that consume less bandwidth for internet calls
choices.B: Ask the team members to use chat tools as an alternative to calls

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
As a first line of action, the PM should first determine the issue and then create a action plan

Selected Answer: A
A is correct answer

Selected Answer: A
A. Determine what the problem is and develop an action plan

Selected Answer: A
For sure A as it should be planned to find solution before acting

questions.question_text:
A few virtual team members are located in a region that generally has good internet connectivity. However, they frequently experience connectivity issues joining team calls during the day.
What should the project manager do?

A team is entering into a forming stage after kickoff, with project objectives identified and team members assigned with roles and responsibilities. However, during the team meetings, a team member does not agree on project documents and makes comments that could affect the performance of other team members.

What should the project manager do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Collaborate with the team to arrive at team ground rules and publish the rules to the team

Selected Answer: A
A is correct

En conclusion, en collaborant avec l’équipe pour établir des règles de base, le chef de projet crée un cadre de travail clair et respectueux qui aide à gérer les comportements perturbateurs de manière proactive et efficace.

choices.B: Request team members document their decisions independently and share with each other.
choices.C: Escalate the team member's disruptive behavior to their functional manager.
choices.D: Observe to ensure this typical forming stage behavior does not escalate beyond what is acceptable.
choices.A: Collaborate with the team to arrive at team ground rules and publish the rules to the team.
